talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
I feel like someone's calling me...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, I had something on my mind that was distracting me...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kanna$
You finally made it, {user_nick}? If you were going to be this late, you might as well have waited until my entire stock of medicine was rotten.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I just feel like someone's calling me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kanna$
What's bothering you?
If you waste all your energy wandering around, you'll end up having even more to worry about. What the heck is it this time?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's not like that! It's just…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kanna$
Someone calling you? Are you bragging about all the people asking for the ace of the renowned Pymon Mercenaries?
Then why don't you do something about all those mission requests piling up over there?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Tells about what is bothering him while drinking tea.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kanna$
Just what? Drink this first. It'll help with your fatigue.
(Kanna hands over a cup of tea.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It, it's not like that!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kanna$
What? You feel like there's somewhere you should be? ... If you're so concerned, why not just go there directly instead of worrying about it here?
Since when have you been so lazy? Please don't tell me you're sticking around because of me. I'll smack you silly.
(Kanna raises her fist.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Accept quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Dreamcatcher$</html>

${user_nick}$
(I don't think it's time yet.)

※ You need to reach Hero Level 2000 and obtain your 2nd Specialization.

$Kanna$
If that's not the case, why are you standing their like an old sloth? Come on! Move!

※ Go to Rhadames. (If you ask Ticket Agent Itahyang you can get there quickly.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That dragon? Isn't that the Red Dragon from before? No, something's different...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Lookalike$
……….
(Someone who looks just like the Red Dragon...?)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wings!? Hey, wait up!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Lookalike$
(He takes off in the direction of Foggy Black Lake as soon as your eyes meet.)

$Butler A$
Missed it again!

$Iris$
You're holding something important.

${user_nick}$
…….

$Butler A$
Missed it again!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
I just saw someone very similar to the Red Dragon... But, was he really someone else?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
But something's still bothering me that I can't get over...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Let's check)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
(It feels like something is approaching.)
Who is that?

${user_nick}$
(It feels like something is approaching.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's... A wisp?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
Missed it again! (It pops up out of nowhere.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That hologram old man, how the heck is he managing security?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
I'm sure I'll be hearing it from Master later...
(Throws the broken net on the floor.)
What are we going to do with this useless junk?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That wisp can talk…? But more importantly, are you saying we've met before?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
Huh? You are… Wait, put that weapon away! Have you already forgotten our last meeting?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The guest must look like me, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
Yes, yes, you are the guest I saw at the nest… Aren't you?
(The wisp is sweating.)
But you still have a very similar vibe to that guest. I'm not an enemy, so please put away your weapon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A wisp butler... Anyway, what are you looking for?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
Yes, your energy is somewhat similar to him. Anyway, nice to meet you.
I'm Butler A/FONT>, who slaves away under the yoke of overtime, night shifts, menial chores, andlow wages… Oh, now's not time for chatter. We must catch him quickly!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The Red Dragon I saw earlier?) Are you talking about Rubinart, the Red Dragon?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
A conceptual apparition has escaped... Did you happen to see him recently?
He has red hair and emits a sort of dark energy...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What is that net anyway?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
Yes, that's him. I tried so hard to catch him with this net...
Could you fix this net for me? I have to find him. He must be somewhere around here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But why do you need to catch the Red Dragon with it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
This was left by him during an experiment. He called it a Dreamcatcher.
He told me that he could use it to catch intentions or dreams or something...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Butler A throws the net at you.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
Well, all of a sudden he was just wandering around the Black Lake, so I grabbed anything I could use to catch him as soon as possible... Anyway, I don't have time to stand around chatting.
If I don't catch it soon, I'll definitely hear it from Master later. Please help me.

${user_nick}$
How could he expect me to fix something made by a dragon...
Maybe I'll find some clues in Merca.

※ Go toMerca's Heart.

$Butler A$
We really need to catch him soon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What is it, kid?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Iris$
You seem to possess an object of great importance. I, Iris, can be of assistance to you. Shall I lend you a hand?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Catching something that does not exist?<FONT color=#7e12d2> (Come to think of it, wasn't it supposed to catch dreams?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Iris$
I'm not a kid. I, Iris know what {user_nick} possesses. It's an object used for catching something that does not exist.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don't fully understand, but are you at least saying it can be fixed?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Iris$
However, the object in your possession is in bad shape, {user_nick}. If you do carefully not reweave the net, you may never be able to use it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: u<html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Birds and mice?)</FONT> So you want me to wait, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Iris$
Iris can do that. But perhaps there are birds and mice flitting about nearby...
If the birds and mice go to sleep, I'll reweave the net.

$Butler A$
We really need to catch him soon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, thanks. But why are you helping me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Iris$
Now that the birds and mice have gone to sleep, I, Iris, will help you. That which is clean is better than that which is dirty.
(When Iris touches the net, it seems to improve in appearance.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>This netting...? It can help me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Iris$
Well... It's because Rubinart wants me to. And I'm sure this will help you, FONT color=#387206>{user_nick}. The woven thread may also harden. Wouldn't that be a good thing?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You're saying he summoned me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Iris$
It will be good for you, {user_nick}, if the thread hardens. When something hardens,it becomes more durable. Isn't that why you went to see Rubinart?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(She speaks in riddles.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Iris$
To be exact, you were attracted to each other. You and Rubinart are connected, {user_nick}. That's why Rubinart called himself, and why he now calls you, too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm not sure, but... I'll learn more when I go there.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Iris$
Does that mean Rubinart's waiting for you, {user_nick}?
Or, are you looking for Rubinart, {user_nick}?

$Iris$
Rubinart will still be there.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Shows the repaired net.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
Just where did he disappear to…
Oh, you're back. Did you repair the net?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Speaking of which, can I come with you to catch the Red Dragon?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
Oh, what a fine item. This looks completely different from that hole-riddled piece of junk.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Sure, why not? (I could at least speak with him then.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
To catch him? Hmm… Of course. Then may I ask you to grab hold of him with this net?
All you have to do is catch him with it.
I've tried and failed many times already.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Butler A$
Thank you. Then I will return to Foggy Black Lake immediately. If you have anything to prepare, please do so quickly and join me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Receive reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

journal.title: [Hero] Dreamcatcher Ⅰ
journal.contents:
It is as if someone is calling you. For whatever reason, it seems you should go to them.

Rhadames - ???

journal.title: [Hero] Dreamcatcher Ⅱ
journal.contents:
The Red Dragon that departed looks quite different from the one you've seen before. Could it be a different person? You should give this some thought.

Rhadames - ???
journal.destination: Organize your thoughts in a corner of Rhadames.
journal.todo_msg: Spend some time alone organizing your thoughts.

journal.title: [Hero] Dreamcatcher ⅡI
journal.contents:
While you were organizing your thoughts, you felt someone approaching. It's a wisp. It looks like he's trying to catch something. Ask him what he's doing.

Rhadames - Butler A
journal.destination: Ask Butler A in Rhadames what he is doing

journal.title: [Hero] Dreamcatcher IV
journal.contents:
Butler A asked you to repair the Dreamcatcher that Red Dragon Rubinart left behind. You should be able to find a way to fix the net if you go to Merca's Heart, right?

Merca's Heart - ???

journal.title: [Hero] Dreamcatcher Ⅴ
journal.contents:
Iris told you to wait for a while because the birds and mice are still around, but now she seems to have something to say. Show Iris the net and get it fixed.

Merca's Heart - Iris

journal.title: [Hero] Dreamcatcher Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Visit Butler A in Rhadames with the Dreamcatcher that Iris repaired.

Rhadames - Butler A
journal.destination: Give the net to Butler A in Rhadames
journal.todo_msg: Let's give the net to Butler A.
